section.name: Analysis
section.p: This document provides an overview of the various documents (and artifacts) links that has been created in order to collect all information about Semantic Web Domain and previous SAPERE projects.

tr.td: This section provides the analysis of the model that comes up from requirements. In particular it's focused on the determination of a uniform API that is able to handle semantics in the most transparent way; in this way the user would be able to interact with a semantic or syntactic space in the same.
